statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30
SELECT name, age FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE age < 25
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, age, location FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, location FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE location LIKE '%California%'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'Male';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, name, age FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers JOIN ad_campaigns ON customers.customer_id = ad_campaigns.campaign_id;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'Female' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget < 5000;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age < 30;
SELECT c.name, p.product_name, p.purchase_date FROM customers c INNER JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.amount > 1000;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE target_age_range LIKE '%18-24%' ORDER BY budget DESC;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.name, SUM(p.amount) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.name HAVING total_spent > 5000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, age, location FROM customers WHERE gender='female' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT customer_id, name, age, location FROM customers WHERE location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT purchase_id, product_name, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-31' AND end_date >= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY campaign_name
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, email, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age < 40;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, target_gender FROM ad_campaigns WHERE target_age_group = '18-35' ORDER BY campaign_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC, purchase_date ASC;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.product_name, d.city FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id WHERE d.income > 50000;

SELECT a.campaign_name, COUNT(ai.impression_id) AS impression_count, SUM(ai.click_count) AS total_clicks FROM ad_campaigns a JOIN ad_impressions ai ON a.campaign_id = ai.campaign_id GROUP BY a.campaign_name HAVING total_clicks > 100;
